channel.description: CC 410 - Week 6 Wrapping Up 2/28 - Debugging & Logging 2/28 - Lambda Expressions 2/28 - Debugging & Logging Example 2/28 - Restaurant 3 2/28 - Final Project 2 This Week 3/8 - GUI Basics Example 3/8 - Restaurant 4 Milestone 4 GUI Basics Create Overall GUI Structure I Give One Example Read Helpful Hints feel free to get creative Looking Ahead Module 7 - Event-Driven Programming Module 8 - Design Patterns & Combos Module 9 - External Libraries Web APIs, etc.
